name: The Living Squirrel
description:
The Living Squirrel is a platformer game where you follow the journey of a flying squirrel while it's running among the trees. However, you can propel it upwards by using a handheld fan OR attract it with an acorn to make it avoid the obstacles!

Left mouse click on the fan: Activate or deactivate the wind flow. Propels the squirrel upwards.
Right mouse click on the fan: Transform the fan into an acorn. Attracts the squirrel to the acorn.

Team

Philippe Torres-Brisebois - Programming
Manuel Torres-Brisebois - Programming
Melissa Lim - 3D
Maximo Mendoza - Sound and UI
Ronald Tain - Sound and UI

Game developed for the Concordia Makes Games 2021.

The map is procedurally generated. Every music tracks, illustrations, icons, and 3D  models are original assets made for this game jam.
